# AI Image Workflow Builder

Der **AI Image Workflow Builder** ist eine professionelle, knotenbasierte Webanwendung zur Orchestrierung von generativen KI-Workflows.

---
*Dokumentation identisch zu v0.2.8, Versionsnummer aktualisiert.*

analysis.description: AI Image Workflow Builder is a professional, node-based web app that lets teams visually design, orchestrate, and run complex generative AI image workflows using Googleâ€™s Gemini stack. It turns adâ€‘hoc prompt hacking into reusable, shareable pipelines that creative and product teams can iterate on in minutes instead of days.

valueProposition: Visual, node-based editor to design and orchestrate complex generative image workflows without deep coding expertise
Standardized, reusable AI pipelines that reduce experimentation time and operational chaos across teams
Native alignment with Google Gemini APIs, making it easier to productize and scale imageâ€‘generation use cases on Google Cloud

customerSegments.name: Digital agencies and creative studios experimenting with generative imagery
pain_points: Fragmented prompt experiments and image tools that donâ€™t scale to client-grade workflows
High labor cost and lead times for iterating on visual concepts and campaign assets

customerSegments.name: Product and AI teams in midâ€‘toâ€‘large SaaS or consumer apps integrating generative image features
pain_points: Custom orchestration code for every new AI use case increases maintenance and slows releases
Lack of a shared, visual way for PMs, designers, and engineers to collaborate on AI workflows

customerSegments.name: Enterprise innovation and R&D groups standardizing on Google Cloud and Gemini
pain_points: Difficulty governing and reusing AI experiments across multiple teams and business units
Need to demonstrate ROI on generative AI by quickly moving from POCs to repeatable workflows

revenueStreams.source: SaaS subscription for hosted AI workflow builder
Enterprise licensing with SSO, governance, and onâ€‘prem/virtual private cloud deployment
Professional services for custom workflow templates and Gemini integration
